resources.string: Quest For Glory

You are sitting in office, quite an ordinary day. Nothing was pointing out that this will be most important day for hero in his rising up to glory.

Suddenly, out of nowhere, mail appears in your inbox.
What will you do?
Ignore the mail. You are not a hero…\n(go to Ichigo, Kurosaki Ichigo)
This is what I’ve been waiting for, I will open the CASE\n(go to Hero in its making)
Ichigo, Kurosaki Ichigo

You pierced sword through one ninja\'s chest, by corner of the eye, you noticed 4 more coming from behind. You thrown shurikens just to get some time, knowing that it can’t do any harm to this hard cored ninjas. But that was enough, you grabbed first ninja for arm and used him as shield against piercing attack from…\nAnd then you woke up…
It was about time, another day finished… You can go\n(go to Problem?)
Hero in its making
Suddenly… Le wild Dakinsa appears asking to open the CASE.
Le wild Dakinsa
Great! I have better things to do. Let him open it\n(go to Problem?)
No! Sometimes man has to do what man has to do\n(go to Clark Gable)
Problem?

Leave those poor fools doing all the hard work. Why don’t I just sit down and start reading new hero daily magazine, about other fools doing the hard work. You would rather sit and enjoy pint of beer…
End of story.\nDon’t like this?\n(go to Quest For Glory)
As you embark on quest of great… no… EPIC proportions, you must choose how to deal with upcoming menace…
Seems I can do it… after all…\n(go to Sand Castle)
I can\'t do it after all… I need to search for quest companions\n(go to Hero Party)
Who cares… I am Tier 1 hero anyway…\n(go to Loshmi The Gray)
Clark Gable

You made it… CASE is solved, and you can bask in your glory.\n\nFrom town to town, your name will be singed, young virgins will repeat your name in their dreams, and jealous husbands will curse you because after tale of your deeds they will never be top male in their wife’s hearts.
Sand Castle
As you enter smoky old dusky tavern, you can see several hard looking fellas, who go about their own business… Seems none of them is noticing you coming in…
I will ask party of semi-veterans, they look capable of doing the muscle work for me.\n(go to Tier 2)
I chose to ask veteran party… Better to have more than less.\n(go to page Tier 3)
I will ask Dakinsa… old friend from thousands battles to help me… more XP for both of us…\n(go to Dacha theTurkish terror)
Hero Party
LoshMi The Gray
As you expose your problem to LoshMi, you can see hint of his smile, as would you look upon child who would try to fight his way with wooden sword against old Oak tree…

Young one, if you want to hear my advice, go far to the north, where mountains touch the sky, where clouds dance among eyes of ones who watch it. There will you find Pedja the oracle\n(go to page Soothsayer)
I help you will… if you do thou quest for me\n(go to Bridge of doom)

After you said number 2, Milan the EarthShaker answered number 2, and since it was correct answer in ancient game of Asocijacije, he won. Therefore he was happy and decided to help you with your quest…
(go to Problem?)
A wild conversation bursts out, what hero will fare best, who will win, where to go, what items to buy, what skills to build, who will support who, who will carry, who will feed… the troops.
And you forgot about CASE at all, before you know it, it’s 17.00h, tavern closing time. (go to page Wheel of time)

The girl on which he is using his ancient and wise seducing methods, is a lady of great beauty, only seen once in the lifetime, that you cry out in cold nights and whose name will never make your lips forget them.
Stop overreacting, she is not that good at all… moderate at best…\n(go to Different tastes)
Wow… she does look like a bomb… or will be in 5 years\n(go to page Grab the chance while you can)

As you approach song becomes more and more louder… you feed like your head will burst, and the pain makes you forget what was your quest in first place, you must make save check in order to resist the spell.
You rolled the dice for resist check and you rolled 5\n(go to I am alive, I am alive)
You rolled the dice for resist check and you rolled 3\n(go to This is the end… my only friend)
LoshMi the mage eyed you up and down as considering will you be up for the task… then he decides that you may be Tier 1 hero, but there is something heroic inside you… so he gives you choices…
Go in to the wilds of Winner, and hunt me some food…if you survive that is…\n(go to rare beast of Becka)
I have no time for you, go to Milan theEarthShaker and ask for his advice…\n(go to Hatori Hanzo)
Dakinsha, young and naive hero wannabe, is skulking around you, waiting to get chance for his piece of glory. After you gave him chance to become famous, he turns his all power into solving CASE.
He tries… harder and harder, and somehow he miraculously does it\n(go to Sand castle)
After hours of trying, he fails to open the CASE, His weapon must be under VPN curse, and therefore unable to open CASE in this realm…\n(go to Wheel of time)
Goran the pervy sage is willing to help you, because maiden was not worth saving, after 5–6 consulting’s with Tier 3 group, you are ready to embark on glorious quest of solving the CASE.
(go to Sand Castle)

Only fools would dare to interrupt Milan the EarthShaker while playing Slagalica with beautiful Milka Canić… In a flashing of en eye, you were whipped out from this world, last thing you heard was 四方八方手裏剣 (All sorts of throwing shuriken :D)
(go to Wheel of Time)

After hearing that it was all a lie, Goran bursts into rage and starts… dancing!? Though the dance was somewhat smooth and catchy, you couldn\'t stand that amount of rhythm, it was like river flushing to your face, with its wild currents. So you chose bravely to… retreat… for now…
(go to Run to the hills)
You fought bravely. Exchanging hit by hit with monster, and fight lasted deep into night, with last ounce of power you tried to throw axe between its eyes…
You rolled 5 (go to Hunter or pray?)
You rolled 6 (go to Solo mid?)
